definition: to preach (the gospel)
to declare (publicly)/to announce
surname Xuan

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: According to the Buddha's claim, this is the ninth stage of Samadhi, reached for the first time by him.
sentences.chinese: 根据佛陀的宣道，这里有九层三摩地，他第一个达到。

sentences.english: To fulfill the Great Commission via healthcare professions under the mission ministry of the Church.
sentences.chinese: 配合教会宣道事工，借由医疗专业实践大使命。

sentences.english: This is one of the activities in my …
sentences.chinese: 这是中华宣道会友爱堂的一个全教会活动。

sentences.english: The cross was not only the theme of his preaching but the rule of his life in all its details.
sentences.chinese: 十字架不仅是他宣道的主题，也是他生命的特质。

definition: to clean the street/to clear the road (i.e. get rid of people for passage of royalty or VIP)
to set off/to take to the road
stern/grim/resolute/firm/unflinching/fundamental colors
to defend traditional values
to offer (tribute)/to present respectfully (to superior, ancestor, deity etc)/to esteem/to revere/to believe in (a religion)/to wait upon/to accept orders (from superior)
surname Xun
herb (old)
lunar orbit/legitimate/righteous/see also 黑道[hei1 dao4]
(affectionate form of address for a male who is not very much younger than oneself) my boy/old pal
variant of 少安毋躁[shao3 an1 wu2 zao4]
human sympathy/humanitarianism/humane/the "human way", one of the stages in the cycle of reincarnation (Buddhism)/sexual intercourse
in my opinion
honorable little brother
Your esteemed older brother (honorific)
paraphernalia of a guard of honor
to perform one's job/attendant/job/duties/(respectful appellation for the addressee) you/your Excellency/(Church) deacon
worthy little brother
to report back to one's superior
